data.title: San Antonio Spurs Roster
data.meta_description: San Antonio Spurs scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
DeJuan Blair was selected as the #7 pick in the Second Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. DeJuan Blair signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 16, 2009.

Tim Duncan was selected as the #1 pick in the First Round of the 1997 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Tim Duncan signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 23, 1997. Tim Duncan re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on August 1, 2000. Tim Duncan re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 16, 2003. Tim Duncan signed a multi-year extension with the San Antonio Spurs on November 2, 2007.

Manu Ginobili was selected as the #28 pick in the Second Round of the 1999 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Manu Ginobili signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on July 18, 2002. Manu Ginobili re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the San Antonio Spurs on July 14, 2004. Manu Ginobili signed a multi-year extension with the San Antonio Spurs on April 8, 2010.

George Hill was selected as the #26 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. George Hill signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on September 23, 2008.

Ian Mahinmi was selected as the #28 pick in the First Round of the 2005 NBA Draft by the San Antonio Spurs. Ian Mahinmi signed a multi-year contract with the San Antonio Spurs on August 23, 2007.
